name: Silhouette (itch) (Wrong Way Games)
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 111: Colors^2.

The theme was "Colors" and the limitation was "You Are Your Own Enemy." I chose to make a Gameboy platformer that was in a 1bit art style and completely lacked color except for black and white. There are some known bugs but I ran out of time, unfortunately. The chair in the kitchen will spawn randomly and the sprite will flicker, so be careful when approaching the table. The final boss only takes one hit and then you have to wait a few seconds for the end sequence to start.  I usually run around the room until it starts. 

I wanted to do more with it, but hope y'all like wandering around the game anyway. Music by VHVS. Thanks for posting your stuff for people to use for free!

Controls:

Z = Jump

X = Run

Up Arrow = Open Doors

Left/Right Arrows = Move Left/Right

Enter = Start
